Title: Temple Grandin
Writer: Temple Grandin (based on the book: "Emergence"), Margaret Scariano (based on the book: "Emergence"), Temple Grandin (based on the book: "Thinking in Pictures"), Christopher Monger (screenplay), Merritt Johnson (screenplay)
Actors: Claire Danes, Julia Ormond, David Strathairn, Catherine O'Hara
Plot: A biopic of Temple Grandin, an autistic woman who has become one of the top scientists in the humane livestock handling industry.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 33 wins & 34 nominations.
